document.title: Student Organizations: It Doesn't Matter if it's Black or White, or Does It?
document.abstract: This interactive session will discuss the findings of a recent study on the participation habits of Black students in social activities at the University of Tennessee. We will examine the experiences of students in predominantly Black and predominantely White organizations and discuss the implications in order to find out if it really matters if it's Black or White.

field.name: location
field.value: Carolyn P. Brown Memorial University Center
